name: The Chicken Pain
description:
Help David and Eli (the best soldiers of Diamond Chicks) to save all the chickens from Mother Base.

Made for Duplicade within 7 days.


CONTROLS:

Player 1: WASD + Space
Player 2: ARROW-KEYS + Enter
ESC - quit
P - pause/unpause

Pick up the nearest chicken (that has an exclamation mark) with pressing Space/Enter, next press on Space/Enter will extract it.


Update:
- Time extended to 77 seconds
- Press P for pause/unpause the game
- Save/fail scores on the result screen for each player
- Game restarts itself after the result screen
